sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from "react"; import gamepage from "../css/gamepage.css"; class GamePage extends Component { state = { name: "Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice", developer: "From Software", rating: "9.5/10", platform: "PC, PS4, Xbox One", release: "March 22, 2019", price: "$59.99", videoURL: "", imageURL: "https://images.pexels.com/photos/20787/pexels-photo.jpg?auto=compress&cs=tinysrgb&h=350", description: "Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice is an action-adventure video game developed by FromSoftware and published by Activision. The game follows a shinobi known as Wolf as he attempts to take revenge on a samurai clan who attacked him and kidnapped his lord", }; render() { return (

{this.state.name}

Developer {this.state.developer}
Rating {this.state.rating}
Platform {this.state.platform}
Release {this.state.release}
Price {this.state.price}


Game Description

{this.state.description}

); } } export default GamePage;
